28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Qatadah narrated from Abu 'Abdullah that Zaid bin Arqam said:"The Prophet (S.A.W) would acclaim oil and Wars for (the treatment of) pleurisy." Qatadah said: "And it is put in the mouth on the side which he is suffering

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي دَوَاءِ ذَاتِ الْجَنْبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Treatment for Pleurisy
